titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/12/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on: (1) 1-hydroxy-6-docosyloxy-2-naphthalenecarboxylic acid (odec); (2) 1-hydroxy-6-octadecyloxy-2-naphthalenecarboxylic acid (londec); and (3) 7-(hexadecylsulfonylamino)-1H-indole (sulfoxan).
